/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is flanked by trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades bathed in sunlight. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sun. Power lines crisscross above, forming a network of lines against the sky. The image is taken from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and perspective to the scene. The colors in the image are bright and vibrant, reflecting the lively atmosphere of the city.
